Lucy Burgoyne

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: E. H. Fish
  3. Location of Family: Chester, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Hebron, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 9
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Date of Death: 1985-08-23
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Lucy Martin
  11. Spouse Name: Wilbur Martin
  12. Source: OTR 104 also p 10 in same; Eloise Thomsen Corres. Grit 2 January 1983; Sunday World-Herald, 31 October 1982; Alpha List OTR; Hebron Journal, 27 September 1907.
